hiveArticle.title: Minnows Feed part 4!
hiveArticle.body:
Once again, ready for another round of SBD sharing goodness!![download (1).png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmQKCMPDVgGoxBfhuopS7aCBCNtPr1o3c8GmDqicHdZox4/download%20(1).png)
Once again, the rules are simple, but I will give them :) simply upvote, follow, comment with the tag #MinnowsFeed and resteem to receive an equal share of the SBD value of the post as it stands 7 days from now!
![images (56).jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmVMYivcMW4JtERdGKfiMtnbrxp4zAMs9nSTyuFSfftL7B/images%20(56).jpg)
I will keep doing this as regularly as I can, for as long as people keep playing with me!... That didn't sound right... Hmm (note to self, make better choices in wording next time!) 

Always remember, people, steem on!

next.title: Struggling a little and need some help.
